https://community.spotify.com/t5/Desktop-Mac/helpfull-HP-printer-techincal-Support-Number-1-888-525-... 
There is always some shiny new marketing idea, media or strategy being presented as the next big thing. I admit I’m easily distracted by cool, new techno-wizardry or the latest marketing fad and at times am overwhelmed by sheer choice. But experience has taught me there is truly nothing new under the sun. When faced with countless choices of apps, software, tools, fads and experts, there is an easy way to take the mystery out of new marketing ideas and instantly figure out if it’s of any use. I’ll share that in a moment First, a quick story on one of these hot ‘new’ marketing topics illustrates how what’s old is new again. The new guise I’m talking about is “content marketing.” According to Wikipedia, content marketing refers to the “creation and sharing of media and publishing content in order to acquire customers.” To this end the content marketer delivers “consistent, valuable information” to the prospective and current customer through a wide variety of media. 
I’ll wager that you immediately think ‘online’ when you hear ‘content marketing.’ Even Wikipedia magnetic-marketing325.jpgmentions the use of “news, video, white papers, e-books, infographics, case studies, how-to guides, question and answer articles, photos,” and more, most of which are delivered digitally. Yet often in cases like this the only thing that’s new is the media (how it’s delivered.) The underlying concept is, you’ll see, as old as the hills. 
It’s interesting that the evolution of printing technology itself—better and faster ways of putting ink on paper—gave rise to the original content marketing in print. Here are some classic examples. 
Jell-O® began distributing free cookbooks, recipe pamphlets and samples door-to-door in 1904 in an effort to lift sluggish sales. Of course these included dessert recipes that promoted their product. Orator Woodward, the owner, originally purchased the rights to Jell-O® for $450 a few years prior. Frustration with slow sales prompted him to offer the product rights to the plant superintendent for $35 when he decided to try this no-name method of marketing. By 1906 they were doing $1 million annually, or about $25 million in today’s dollars, thanks to content marketing in its printed form. (No, he did not sell the rights!) 
Going further back to 1895, John Deere started its own magazine called The Furrow. It delivered tips to farmers on how to make more money and be more productive. The company celebrated 175 years in 2012 and does about $33 billion annually. It still publishes The Furrow, sending it to a list of 1.5 million readers in 40 countries. 
Another famous example is the Michelin Guide. It was originally a free travel tip guide for automotive travelers which began distribution in 1900. The idea was to boost demand for cars, car travel, and subsequently tires. Then there’s Buyer’s Guide Place started by a photography/electronics store named Magnolia in 1954. Their goal was to teach prospective customers how to buy electronic items wisely. Magnolia later sold out to Best Buy for $87 million. 
That’s the ongoing power of content marketing. Provide something of value to prospective clients on a regular basis. They get to know you, trust you, and understand what you have to offer. If you’re talking to the right prospects, when the time is right, they’ll buy something from you. 
It’s not complicated. It’s definitely not new. It’s simply a marketing strategy that gets a new name every few years. Business author Dan Kennedy called it magnetic marketing…more than 20 years ago. Another name for it is inbound marketing. (That’s hot now too.) The gist is that you are attracting customers to you rather than promoting through advertising and other ‘outbound’ methods. 
Don’t get me wrong. There is no single right or wrong way to promote a business. My point is that if you ignore content marketing, especially in print, you are losing significant business. 
So what’s my secret to taking the mystery out of countless marketing ideas and fads? I picture my ideal customer and my plan to attract, get to know, and do business with them. Then regarding that shiny new marketing object I simply ask, “Will this help me accomplish any of that?” 
When I first started reading about the content marketing sensation, I laughed because I have been doing it for years and getting great results. I didn’t even have to ask my shiny object question. Our primary media for delivering content is the printed newsletter along with an enewsletter. Second to that we use every oth 
It’s proven to work in any business. Just look at our industry examples above. We have tires, food, farm equipment, electronics and printing. It’s not a fad and it can be productive for decades at a time. 
Remember too that your reader will find value in a wide variety of content. Yes, we deliver industry-specific content in order to help our readers. Yet we know that they also value a good laugh, a bit of light distraction and personal development tips as much or more than the industry content itself. 
So be sure to reach out on a regular basis, in as many ways as you can. Content marketing, especially in print, instantly sets you apart from your competitors. Make it a part of your marketing plan for attracting your ideal customer.

posts.title: How To Choose A Residential Appraisal Management Dallas Organization Appropriately
posts.text:
By Arthur Miller 

Making long lasting decisions on how you approach your business endeavors should be a matter that basically you carefully think over without jumping into conclusions. The success of it lies entirely on how keen you were during your planning. It is with the same manner that when choosing a residential appraisal management Dallas organization has to be handled wisely. The following pointers will be of help to you.

The first step would be to locate available companies in your state. Usually, most of these establishments have websites which you can visit to read some of their reviews. Take your time while going through them and have a handful of names that you will consider. Select companies which have physical addresses and contacts that reach back to them.

Make a list of at least five to six entities which you can work with after completing your vetting process. The next thing to consider is if the business is licensed and insured. It would be wrong for you to hire an organization that does not have its papers straight because you will be bound to get on the wrong side of the local authorities in your state.

It would be best if you schedule a meet up with the representative of the company for the purpose of carrying out further investigation of the establishment. The main reason for you to do this is so that you can get to see what kind of organization it is and have an opportunity to have all your questions answered concerning the appraisal. If at all you feel that they do not give satisfactory answers then skip to the next organization.

Choosing a company that has qualified employees should be part of your target. Remember at some point, you will have to be assigned an individual who will lead you through the whole process. It is therefore mandatory that you consider an institution that has qualified and certified workers to avoid putting your business into jeopardy.

It is always a safe bet to work with organizations that have been in the business for a significant amount of years, preferably more than two. This shows that they are aware of the pros and cons that the business has and have proper ways to dealing with them therefore, you should consider asking the representative to show you some of the appraisals they have worked on for you to see if they are right for the job.

You should come into an agreement on the estimate of their services as well as that of your business. Find out how much they will be charging you and the mode of payment that they expect. Be precisely clear on this so that you do not end up having surprise payments when the work has already began. Be open to those that are affordable and not too expensive.

Be vigilant on looking at the previous track record of the entity. You should note if the company has been flagged for complaints in the past or have been involved in any criminal activities. Consider their financial stability and see if they are a stable establishment. You can as well contact their previous clients to hear what they have to say about the services they received. Do not be easily manipulated into accepting any entity.




About the Author:

When you are searching for information about residential appraisal management Dallas residents can come to our web pages online today. More details are available at http://www.southtexasappraisalmanagement.com now.

thread.title: 伦敦世界旅游交易会开幕 中国派最大规模代表团参展_城市频道_环球网
thread.title_full: 伦敦世界旅游交易会开幕 中国派最大规模代表团参展_城市频道_环球网

posts.title: 伦敦世界旅游交易会开幕 中国派最大规模代表团参展_城市频道_环球网
posts.text:
作为全球专业旅游盛会，世界旅游交易会是展示各国形象及各国旅游品牌的一个重要平台。中国国家旅游局带领26个省级旅游行政管理部门、20余家旅行社以及景区、航空公司等单位负责人共120余人参加本届交易会。 
中国国家旅游局驻伦敦办事处主任匡林告诉记者，从总体上看，中国入境旅游正处于一个上升的黄金期，世界各国游客对中国的兴趣和感知认知也在逐步提升。 
“国际游客不仅仅对我们的京、沪、桂等传统经典线路感兴趣，对中西部地区，对丝绸之路，对香格里拉，对东北的冰雪旅游，对长三角都非常憧憬。”匡林说。 
乌镇近年来因举办世界互联网大会以及乌镇戏剧节等在国际上声名鹊起。乌镇旅游股份有限公司总裁助理姚洁对记者说，世界旅游交易会是一个让业内人士和游客更好地了解中国古镇的好机会，他们能了解到“乌镇不仅仅是一个江南小镇，小桥流水人家，它更多的是可以让你们住下来，真正体验中国文化”。 
除了传统旅游景点外，中国中西部景点成为本次展会的一大亮点。青海旅游推广负责人多杰尖措表示，目前越来越多的国际游客开始关注青海等中西部地区。“青海发展得比较快，我们想给世界展现一个大美青海、人文青海和一个和谐的青海。” 
本届伦敦世界旅游交易会将持续到11月8日。据主办方介绍，今年有来自世界各地5000多家参展商前来参展。

thread.title: Presidente do Parlamento Europeu defende regras claras para as energias limpas
thread.title_full: Presidente do Parlamento Europeu defende regras claras para as energias limpas

posts.title: Presidente do Parlamento Europeu defende regras claras para as energias limpas
posts.text:
Presidente do Parlamento Europeu defende regras claras para as energias limpas 07.11.2017 às 9h26 Link: reuters Antonio Tajani afirmou em Bruxelas que todas as empresas devem saber "com clareza" as regras do jogo, para poderem investir com segurança nas energias renováveis Miguel Prado Jornalista 
O presidente do Parlamento Europeu, Antonio Tajani, defendeu esta terça-feira que no mercado das energias renováveis "os operadores devem beneficiar de um quadro jurídico estável" e conhecer "com clareza" as regras do jogo. 
A negociação da proposta da Comissão Europeia para a área de energia e clima, que introduzirá um quarto pacote legislativo para os Estados-membros, não é, segundo Tajani, "apenas uma questão política". 
Para o presidente do Parlamento Europeu, é preciso "pôr as mãos à obra" para aprovar o novo enquadramento jurídico para a energia, que, só nos documentos propostos pela Comissão Europeia, contabiliza cerca de 4 mil páginas. 
Antonio Tajani afirmou esta terça-feira, numa conferência do Parlamento Europeu sobre investimentos em energia limpa, que "a transição energética representa uma oportunidade de crescimento que a Europa não pode desperdiçar". 
Mas para que essa oportunidade seja aproveitada, admitiu o presidente do Parlamento Europeu, é necessário um quadro de regras previsível e sinergias com financiamento público para incentivar o investimento privado. 
Tajani desdramatizou, por outro lado, as posições que vêm sendo assumidas pelo presidente norte-americano, Donald Trump, em matéria de energia e clima. Segundo Tajani, nos Estados Unidos há muitas outras personalidades que defendem uma política promotora das energias limpas. Um dos exemplos apontados pelo presidente do Parlamento Europeu foi o Estado da Califórnia, que representa 15% da energia limpa gerada nos EUA. 
*O jornalista viajou a Bruxelas a convite do Parlamento Europeu. Palavras-chave

thread.title: İstifa eden Lübnan Başbakanı Hariri, Abu Dabi’ye geçti
thread.title_full: İstifa eden Lübnan Başbakanı Hariri, Abu Dabi’ye geçti

posts.title: İstifa eden Lübnan Başbakanı Hariri, Abu Dabi’ye geçti
posts.text: İstifa eden Lübnan Başbakanı Hariri, Abu Dabi’ye geçti HABER ÖZETI ABD Başkanı Donald Trump'ın İran'a karşı sert politikası ve Suudi Arabistan'ın bölgede gerilimi yükseltmesinin ardından İran'dan açıklama geldi. Televizyon Hariri'nin Riyad'dan ayrıldığını, Abu Dabi'ye giderek Birleşik Arap Emirlikleri (BAE) Veliaht Prensi Muhammed bin Zeyd el Nahyan ile görüşeceğini duyurdu. İstifa açıklamasında Hizbullah ve İran’ı suçlayan Hariri’nin bu kararı ülke yönetiminde Hizbullah ve Cumhurbaşkanı Mişel Avn ittifakının etkisini kıramamasına bağlanıyor. Bahreyn Dışişleri Bakanlığı, konuyla ilgili açıklama yaparak Bahreyn vatandaşlarından Lübnan'ı terk etmelerini istedi, açıklamada Bahreynlilerin Lübnan'a gitmesinin yasaklandığı da söylendi.

When faced with countless choices of apps, software, tools, fads and experts, there is an easy way to take the mystery out of new marketing ideas and instantly figure out if it’s of any use. I’ll share that in a moment First, a quick story on one of these hot ‘new’ marketing topics illustrates how what’s old is new again. The new guise I’m talking about is “content marketing.” According to Wikipedia, content marketing refers to the “creation and sharing of media and publishing content in order to acquire customers.” To this end the content marketer delivers “consistent, valuable information” to the prospective and current customer through a wide variety of media. 
I’ll wager that you immediately think ‘online’ when you hear ‘content marketing.’ Even Wikipedia magnetic-marketing325.jpgmentions the use of “news, video, white papers, e-books, infographics, case studies, how-to guides, question and answer articles, photos,” and more, most of which are delivered digitally. Yet often in cases like this the only thing that’s new is the media (how it’s delivered.) The underlying concept is, you’ll see, as old as the hills. 
It’s interesting that the evolution of printing technology itself—better and faster ways of putting ink on paper—gave rise to the original content marketing in print. Here are some classic examples. 
Jell-O® began distributing free cookbooks, recipe pamphlets and samples door-to-door in 1904 in an effort to lift sluggish sales. Of course these included dessert recipes that promoted their product. Orator Woodward, the owner, originally purchased the rights to Jell-O® for $450 a few years prior. Frustration with slow sales prompted him to offer the product rights to the plant superintendent for $35 when he decided to try this no-name method of marketing. By 1906 they were doing $1 million annually, or about $25 million in today’s dollars, thanks to content marketing in its printed form. (No, he did not sell the rights!) 
Going further back to 1895, John Deere started its own magazine called The Furrow. It delivered tips to farmers on how to make more money and be more productive. The company celebrated 175 years in 2012 and does about $33 billion annually. It still publishes The Furrow, sending it to a list of 1.5 million readers in 40 countries. 
Another famous example is the Michelin Guide. It was originally a free travel tip guide for automotive travelers which began distribution in 1900. The idea was to boost demand for cars, car travel, and subsequently tires. Then there’s Buyer’s Guide Place started by a photography/electronics store named Magnolia in 1954. Their goal was to teach prospective customers how to buy electronic items wisely. Magnolia later sold out to Best Buy for $87 million. 
That’s the ongoing power of content marketing. Provide something of value to prospective clients on a regular basis. They get to know you, trust you, and understand what you have to offer. If you’re talking to the right prospects, when the time is right, they’ll buy something from you. 
It’s not complicated. It’s definitely not new. It’s simply a marketing strategy that gets a new name every few years. Business author Dan Kennedy called it magnetic marketing…more than 20 years ago. Another name for it is inbound marketing. (That’s hot now too.) The gist is that you are attracting customers to you rather than promoting through advertising and other ‘outbound’ methods. 
Don’t get me wrong. There is no single right or wrong way to promote a business. My point is that if you ignore content marketing, especially in print, you are losing significant business. 
So what’s my secret to taking the mystery out of countless marketing ideas and fads? I picture my ideal customer and my plan to attract, get to know, and do business with them. Then regarding that shiny new marketing object I simply ask, “Will this help me accomplish any of that?” 
When I first started reading about the content marketing sensation, I laughed because I have been doing it for years and getting great results. I didn’t even have to ask my shiny object question. Our primary media for delivering content is the printed newsletter along with an enewsletter. Second to that we use every oth 
It’s proven to work in any business. Just look at our industry examples above. We have tires, food, farm equipment, electronics and printing. It’s not a fad and it can be productive for decades at a time. 
Remember too that your reader will find value in a wide variety of content. Yes, we deliver industry-specific content in order to help our readers. Yet we know that they also value a good laugh, a bit of light distraction and personal development tips as much or more than the industry content itself. 
So be sure to reach out on a regular basis, in as many ways as you can. Content marketing, especially in print, instantly sets you apart from your competitors. Make it a part of your marketing plan for attracting your ideal customer.

thread.title: 신한 글로벌 헤지펀드 포럼 "주목받는 대체투자 기법 등 투자.운용전략 노하우 공유" "한
thread.title_full: 신한 글로벌 헤지펀드 포럼 "주목받는 대체투자 기법 등 투자.운용전략 노하우 공유" "한

posts.author: 파이낸셜뉴스
posts.title: 신한 글로벌 헤지펀드 포럼 "주목받는 대체투자 기법 등 투자.운용전략 노하우 공유" "한
posts.text:
신한 글로벌 헤지펀드 포럼 "주목받는 대체투자 기법 등 투자.운용전략 노하우 공유"
"한국형 헤지펀드는 그동안 급성장했지만, 운용전략의 다양성 부족은 해결해야 될 과제다."
김형진 신한금융투자 사장(사진)은 7일 서울 여의도 콘래드호텔에서 열린 '신한 글로벌 헤지펀드 포럼 2017'에서 한국 헤지펀드 시장에 대해 이같이 진단했다. 신한금융투자는 국내외 유수 헤지펀드 매니저들과의 교류 기회와 헤지펀드 투자에 대한 정보를 제공하기 위해 이번 포럼을 마련했다. 이번 포럼엔 국내 6개사와 해외 10개사를 합해 총 16개 헤지펀드 운용사가 참여했다.
김 사장은 한국 헤지펀드 시장의 한계에 대해 지적했다. 그는 "한국형 헤지펀드는 지난 2011년 출범해 6년 만에 규모가 다섯 배 이상 커지면서 총 잔고가 13조원에 이를 정도로 급격하게 성장했다"며 "그러나 급격한 성장에 비해서 운용자산과 운용기법의 다양성이 떨어진다는 지적이 있는 것도 사실이다"라고 말했다.
김 사장은 한국 헤지펀드 시장이 다양한 운용전략을 통해 한걸음 더 나아갈 수 있을 것으로 내다봤다. 그는 "오늘 행사에는 헤지펀드 관련 이슈를 주제로 진행되는 전문가들의 패널토론과 더불어 참여자들이 개별 헤지펀드 운용사와 미팅을 할 수 있는 공간도 마련했다"며 "이번 포럼이 최근 시장에서 많은 관심을 받는 대체투자 기법 등 글로벌 헤지펀드의 다양한 운용전략을 알아갈 수 있는 자리가 되기를 기대한다"고 말했다.
실제로 첫 번째 패널토론 시간에는 '최근 시장 환경을 고려한 ALP 투자전략'을 주제로 해외 해외펀드 운용사의 경험담을 들을 수 있었다. ALP(Alternative Loan Portfolio)는 '비은행 대출' 또는 '대체대출'을 뜻한다.
헤지펀드 운용사 M360의 최고경영자(CEO) 에반 젠트리는 "금융위기 이후 대출 수요는 증가하는데 여러 규제로 인해 은행의 대출 규모는 축소됐다"며 "이러한 부분을 헤지펀드 또는 대체대출기관이 채울 수 있다"고 설명했다. 또 다른 헤지펀드 운용사 BAF의 공동창업자인 어네스토 린하르트는 "은행권은 대출 서비스가 굉장히 표준화 돼있지만, 헤지펀드는 이러한 부분에서 맞춤형 서비스를 제공할 수 있다"고 덧붙였다.
이날 포럼 참석자들은 행사가 대체적으로 유익했다고 평가했다. 20년 넘게 은행권에서 근무한 안영섭씨는 "저금리 시대에 위험부담을 줄이면서 시장보다 높은 수익을 낼 수 있는 헤지펀드의 노하우를 알 수 있었다"고 말했다.
ethica@fnnews.com 남건우 기자 ※ 저작권자 ⓒ 파이낸셜뉴스 . 무단 전재-재배포 금지

thread.title: Новый терминал аэропорта "Пермь" не сможет принимать международные рейсы.
thread.title_full: Новый терминал аэропорта "Пермь" не сможет принимать международные рейсы. // Advis.ru

posts.author: advis.ru
posts.title: Новый терминал аэропорта "Пермь" не сможет принимать международные рейсы.
posts.text:
Первое время после открытия пассажирский терминал будет обслуживать только внутренние воздушные линии.
К открытию, намеченному на 1 декабря 2017 года, пермский аэропорт не успевает получить допуск к работе на международных воздушных линиях от межведомственной комиссии, сообщается на директора ООО "Новапорт Холдинг" Сергея Рудакова. Таким образом, первые несколько месяцев полеты за границу будут осуществляться из "старого здания" аэропорта.
"К 27 ноября в аэропорту должны завершиться строительные работы, а дата заседания межведомственной комиссии будет назначена ориентировочно на 20-е числа декабря. После работы комиссии на старт международных полетов потребуется еще около полутора месяцев", — заявил изданию Рудаков.
Как сообщал РБК Пермь, строительство нового терминала пермского аэропорта началось осенью 2015 года. Площадь аэровокзала составит 29 тысяч м?. В год воздушная гавань будет обслуживать более двух миллионов человек. Инвестором выступает компания "Новая Колхида" (учреждена ООО "Новапорт"). Новый терминал должен быть принят в эксплуатацию 1 декабря 2017 года.
Реклама
Отметим, ситуации, когда новый аэровокзал не может получить допуск для работы с международными рейсами, происходят регулярно. Так, терминал аэропорта в Нижнем Новгороде был открыт в декабре 2015 года. С февраля он стал принимать внутренние авиарейсы и только с апреля 2017 года смог обслуживать международные воздушные линии.

thread.section_title: Выставки
thread.title: Египет планирует модернизировать все аэропорты страны.
thread.title_full: Египет планирует модернизировать все аэропорты страны. // Advis.ru

posts.author: advis.ru
posts.title: Египет планирует модернизировать все аэропорты страны.
posts.text:
На полную модернизацию систем безопасности и аэронавигации Каир выделил $360 млн
Египет выделяет средства для модернизации и расширения своих аэропортов. Об этом сообщил в субботу вечером спутниковому телеканалу Sada El-Balad министр гражданской авиации страны Шериф Фатхи.
"В Каирском международном аэропорту уже проводятся работы по модернизации, которые обойдутся в 700 млн египетских фунтов ($40 млн), - сказал он. - При этом, финансирование проектов по развитию инфраструктуры воздушной гавани будет осуществляться за счет частных компаний, входящих в холдинг Egypt Air, и не ляжет бременем на государственный бюджет".
Кроме того, по словам Фатхи, министерство "работает над улучшением инфраструктуры в аэропорту Хургады", существует план расширения воздушной гавани Александрии. "Выделяется 450 млн египетских фунтов ($25,5 млн) на расширение аэропорта красноморского курортного города Шарм-эш-Шейх, чтобы повысить его пропускную способность до двух млн пассажиров", - отметил министр. Есть также планы по развитию аэропорта в центре Синайского полуострова.
В рамках долгосрочной стратегии по развитию воздушного флота, указал Фатхи, к концу 2018 года планируется ввести в строй 45 новых самолетов, приобретаемых в лизинг. По словам министра, сейчас Egypt Air ежегодно перевозит более 8,5 млн пассажиров, и, ориентируясь на перспективные рынки, планирует открывать новые направления.
В течение последних двух лет Египет осуществляет полную модернизацию систем безопасности и аэронавигации аэропортов, выделив на эти цели $360 млн. Так, $60 млн уже направлено на развитие систем безопасности, $300 млн пойдет на совершенствование аэронавигационных систем, которые полностью должны быть обновлены в 2019 году.

posts.title: 胡军时装品牌2018新品发布 美女江铠同现身助阵_娱乐_环球网
posts.text:
11月6日，著名男星胡军的男装品牌“JUN by YO—2018 beyond the seasons”大秀暨新品发布会在北京798举行，发布会现场众星云集，徐帆、李亚鹏、袁泉、江铠同、贾青等悉数到场。元气女神江铠同一席驼色休闲牛仔元素风衣搭配清新的中长卷发亮相，为初冬的北京秀场红毯注入活力。 
活动现场，当被记者问及日常的穿衣风格及必备单品时，江铠同表示：“我平时喜欢穿着简单舒适的衣服，然后搭配一些小的流行元素，比如耳环、项链、手链等”。此次胡军品牌秀活动，江铠同作为特邀嘉宾前来助阵，受到不少时尚界人士及媒体的关注。 责编：张田宇

posts.author: James_Himbo
posts.title: #Review รีวิว | ✱ Faith in Face ✱ | คลีนซิ่งวอเตอร์ กับ โฟมล้างหน้า
posts.text:
สวัสดีครับเพื่อนๆ
สำหรับกระทู้นี้ เนื้อหาคือเจมส์อยากจะแชร์ของที่เจมส์ใช้เองนิแหละ
ซึ่งถือว่าดีและโอเคมากๆ หาซื้อง่าย ราคาไม่สูง หาซื้อได้จากวัตสัน
น้องๆนักเรียน นักศึกษาเองก็สามารถซื้อใช้ตามกันได้ครับ
เพื่อว่าใครกำลังลังเล อยากเก็บข้อมูลในการตัดสินใจซื้อตัวนี้อยู่
นั่นคือแบรนด์ Faith in Face แบรนด์จากเกาหลี
ถ้าใครเคยอ่านกระทู้เก่าๆของเจมส์คือจะบอกว่า เจมส์รีวิวแบรนด์นี้เยอะมาก จนเกือบจะครบอยู่แล้ว
ขากแค่มาสก์ใต้ตาเอง เท่านั้น และจะบอกว่าแบรนด์นี้ทำคะแนนออกมาดีมาก
เจมส์ชอบเกือบหมดจริงๆ และวันนี้เจมส์ก็หยิบของที่ใช้มารีวิวกันต่อ
ก็จะเป็น Cleansing Water ครับ กับ ตัว Facial Foam ล้างหน้านั่นเอง
หลายคนอ่านแล้วนึกไม่ออก แต่พอเห็นเชื่อว่าเพื่อนๆต้องเคยเห็นกันแหละ
บอกเลยว่า Cleansing Water ขวดนี้เจมส์ใช้มาเป็นขวดที่ 4 แล้ว แล้วก็จะหมดแล้วด้วย
เนื่องจากด้วยความที่แบรนด์นี้มีโปรโมชั่นบ่อยๆ
เช่น ชิ้นที่ 2 หนึ่งบาท บ้าง 1 แถม 1 บ้าง ก็เลยจัดมาเสมอ
บอกเลยว่าอ่อนโยนดีและสะอาดด้วย
ส่วนโฟมล้างหน้าตัวนี้ บอกเลยว่านี่คือหลอดแรกที่ได้ลอง เพราะนางลดราคาเลยซื้อมา
ซึ่งก่อนหน้านี้ไม่เคยคิดจะซื้อเลยเพราะมีโฟมล้างหน้าที่ชอบอยู่แล้ว
แต่พอได้ใช้ คุณพระ !!! หลอดแรกก็คว้ารางวัล Favorite จากเจมส์ไปได้เลยทันที
ถ้าอยากรู้ว่าสองตัวนี้ดียังไง
เรามาเริ่มรีวิวกันเลยดีกว่าครับ
เริ่มที่ตัวแรก
Cleansing Water เช็ดๆ ทำความสะอาดเครื่องสำอาง ขวดน่ารัก สดใส
Faith in Face - Truly Waterly Cleansing Water
ผลิตภัณฑ์เช็ดทำความสะอาดเครื่องสำอางค์สูตรน้ำอ่อนโยนสำหรับทุกสภาพผิวแม้ผิวแพ้ง่าย พร้อมสารสกัดจากธรรมชาตินานาชนิดช่วยเติมความชุ่มชื้นให้ผิว
ปริมาณสุทธิ : 300 mL
ราคา : 349 บาท
เรามาเริ่มทดสอบประสิทธิภาพกันดีกว่าเพื่อไม่ได้เสียเวลา

posts.author: best5626
posts.title: 알고사는 [르노삼성]뉴SM5플래티넘 1.6 TCE S/S 컬렉션 중고차시세표
posts.text:
차량번호만 말씀해주시면 빠르게 상담 도와드립니다 !
안녕하세요! 수도권 판매 1순위 정직딜러 신과장입니다!
?저 신과장은 소비자에게 차량 판매부터 판매 후 관리까지 모두 도와드리고 있습니다.
여러 상사 / 매매단지의 가격 비교 를 통하여 최저가 로 소개시켜드릴것을 약속합니다.
또한, 할부 이율도 다른 곳 보다 훨씬 저렴한 4%이율 로 소개시켜드릴것을 약속합니다.
또한, 신용등급이 낮으시고 회생중이신분 또는 무직자,가정주부,대학생,군미필자,프리랜서 등..
모든 고객님들께도 예외할부승인을 이용한 전액할부 를 도와드리고있습니다.
지금 보시는 차량의 " 스펙 " 부터 설명드리겠습니다!
차명 [르노삼성]뉴SM5플래티넘 1.6 TCE S/S 컬렉션
연식 2014.04
미션/연료 CAR_ Oil
차량번호 34러3277
거리 122,129 km
색상 회색
사고정보
★ 가격 665만원 ★
거품을 쏙 뺀 가격으로 고객님들께 소개시켜드리는 가격으로
가성비와 실용성 모두 훌륭한
[르노삼성]뉴SM5플래티넘 1.6 TCE S/S 컬렉션 차량입니다! ^ - ^
중고차의 장점은
큰 금액이 없어도 좋은 차량을 구입 하실 수 있다는건데요!
그렇다고 모두가 저렴한 가격에 좋은 차량을 구입 할 수 있는건 아닙니다..
차량 정보에 대해 잘 없어도
좋은 차를 구매하기위해서는 어떤딜러를 만나느냐가
가장 중요하다고 생각합니다!
저희 상사에서는 10년 이상의 경력의 베테랑 전문 카매니저들이 많이 있습니다!
전문 카매니저와 함께 상담받으셔서 차량 정보도 얻어가시고
차량상태도 공업사에 방문하셔서
꼼꼼히 점 검해보시고 , 꼭 좋은 차로만 소개 시켜드리니
직접 방문하셔서 한번 차량 상태를 확인해보세요!
신차를 구매하시는 것도 좋지만!! 시간이 지나면 내 차도 중고차 .. 내 차 팔때는 금새 떨어져버리는 차 값 .. 반.대.로 신차급 중고차 를 저렴한 가격에 구매해가세요!
신차에 비해 비용부담도 적고 저희 중고차를 이용하여 구매하시면 보증도 해 드리고 있습니다
또한 , 신차 구매할때와 마찬가지로 깨끗하고 청결한 상태로 타실 수 있게 실 내 경정비 및 실내 크리닝이 완료된 차량 입니다!!
차량을 구매하시면 유류비 지원은 물론 블랙박스 및 하이패스를 사은품 으로 드려요!!
저렴한 가격으로 차량이 조기 판매 될 수 있으니 서둘러 연락주세요!!
 0
딱 전화 한통만 해보셔도 느끼실겁니다!!
다른 상사와는 다른 영업방침으로
후회와 실망없이 좋은 차량만을 엄선하여 소개시켜드리겠습니다!!
저희 상사는 차량 구매 후 에도 지속적인 '후 관리' 를 통한
재방문율200% / 재구매율200% / 지인소개율900% 를 자랑하고 있습니다.

지금까지 아끼며 타신 차량 !

posts.title: Güney Kore ve ABD'den KDHC'ye 'müzakere' çağrısı
posts.text: HABER ÖZETI Güney Kore ve ABD, Kore Demokratik Halk Cumhuriyeti'nden nükleer programını durdurmasını ve müzakerelere başlamasını istedi. Trump ve Moon, Kore'deki ABD Kuvvetleri (USFK) Komutanı General Vincent K. Brooks'dan Kuzey Kore meselesine ilişkin bilgi aldı. ABD Başkanı Trump, Kuzey Kore'yle yaşanan gerginliği arttırması beklenen ziyareti çerçevesinde, Güney Koreli yetkililerle nükleer tehdidi konuşacak. Trump, sonrasında Güney Kore Devlet Başkanı Moon Jae-in ile birlikte helikopterle ABD'nin Camp Humphreys Üssüne giderek, buradaki askerlerle bir araya gelip öğle yemeği yedi.

posts.title: Games die het beste profiteren van de Xbox One X – Klant is koning (Artikel)
posts.text:
Games die het beste profiteren van de Xbox One X – Klant is koning Artikel | 7 november 2017 - 
Deze week verschijnt de Xbox One X, de krachtigste console tot nu toe. In onze recensie van het apparaat gaven we al aan dat bezitters van zowel een 4K-televisie als een full-HD-scherm een betere ervaring kunnen verwachten, maar die regel gaat niet altijd op. De mate waarin games verschillen van de Xbox One- en PlayStation 4 (Pro)-versies is afhankelijk van de behandeling die de ontwikkelaar de game heeft gegeven. Daarom zetten we hier een aantal titels op een rijtje die het beste profiteren van de doos met zes teraflops. 
Om verwarring te voorkomen: iedere Xbox One-game profiteert van de upgrade. Zonder een speciale patch voor 4K, HDR en verbeterde details zien games er dus ook beter uit. Titels met een variabele framerate, zoals Halo 5, draaien bijvoorbeeld op de One X altijd op de maximale resolutie en games die de 30fps of 60fps niet altijd halen, doen dit grotendeels wel. Andere extra’s zijn significant kortere laadtijden en anisotropic filtering , waarmee de beeldkwaliteit van de verdere omgeving wordt verbeterd. De Xbox One X doet echter niets aan de vaste resolutie en framerates van games, want juist daarvoor is een patch nodig. 
Forza Motorsport 7 Het paradepaardje van de Xbox One X is natuurlijk Forza Motorsport 7. In de afgelopen jaren heeft Forza met de overstap naar een nieuwe generatie consoles flinke sprongen gemaakt op het gebied van graphics, en het nieuwste deel ziet er ook weer oogverblindend mooi uit. Het is een van de weinige games die op de One X steevast op zestig frames per seconde in native 4K draait. Hoewel het hogere aantal pixels in combinatie met HDR al een flinke verbetering is ten opzichte van de One en One S, biedt de One X nog een aantal kleine toevoegingen. Motion blur is geavanceerder, schaduwen hebben een hogere resolutie en verbeterde anisotropic filteringgeeft de racebanen iets meer detail. Dit zijn niet de meest in het oog springende verbeteringen, maar passen bij het prachtige totaalpakket van de racer. 
Daarnaast heeft het grafisch spektakel van Forza dit jaar ook meer weerklank in de gameplay, vooral vanwege het dynamischere weer. Tijdens races in de plensregen kunnen zomaar droogtes invallen die invloed hebben op de grip van de auto, of korte buien die van de circuits een ijsbaan maken. Mede dankzij een uitstekende carrièremodus en een uitgebreid aanbod aan auto’s en circuits is Forza Motorsport 7 een absolute aanrader voor bij de Xbox One X. Lees meer over de game in de recensie van Joe .. Middle-earth: Shadow of War Shadow of War kwam een aantal keer negatief in het nieuws, maar uiteindelijk is de game behoorlijk goed ontvangen. Het fameuze Nemisis-systeem is veel verder uitgebreid en geeft de acties van personages een realistische twist. De hoogtepunten van de game zijn de gigantische bestormingen, waarbij hoofdpersoon Talion zijn leger op een tot de tanden bewapend fort afstuurt. Niet alleen voor spelers zijn deze momenten zeer intens, maar ook de consoles moeten hard werken om de vele npc’s en effecten bij te benen. 
Daarom is het juist zo fijn dat Shadow of War spelers een hoop opties geeft op de Xbox One X. Zo is er een Quality Mode, die de voorkeur geeft aan gedetailleerdere omgevingen, en een Resolution Mode, die de game te allen tijde laat draaien in volledig 4K. De Quality Mode zit hier regelmatig iets onder, omdat de resolutie dynamisch geschaald wordt aan de hand van de cpu- en gpu-last. Wel maakt het de game enigszins gedetailleerder en wordt de kijkafstand van Talion merkbaar groter. In alle gevallen ziet Shadow of War er significant beter uit dan de Xbox One- en PlayStation 4 (Pro)-versie, dankzij het omvangrijke 4K-texture pack van de pc. Lees hier waarom Middle-earth: Shadow of War een 8,5 verdient van Lars . 
Titanfall 2 Een van de beste shooters van afgelopen jaar krijgt ook een speciale behandeling, namelijk Titanfall 2. Ontwikkelaar Respawn Entertainment is al een tijd bezig met het optimaliseren van de game en kwam een aantal maanden terug met het nieuws dat de game tijdens het testen zelfs een 6K-resolutie behaalde. Dit komt omdat de Dynamic Syperscaling-techniek van de pc-versie wordt overgezet naar de console, waarmee de gpu altijd honderd procent benut wordt. In de praktijk betekent dit dat de resolutie van de game vrij flexibel geschaald wordt rondom een 2160p-resolutie. Hier bovenop krijgt de game een aantal extra’s op het gebied van details, en zullen alle verbeteringen merkbaar zijn in de singleplayer- en multiplayer-modus. 
De dynamische resolutie is ook in het origineel aanwezig en zorgt ervoor dat de game gewoonweg heerlijk wegspeelt. De singleplayer-campagne is dankzij het creatief omgaan met de mechsuits een zeer sterke toevoeging op de multiplayer. In de maanden na de lancering heeft Respawn een hoop gratis content toegevoegd, waaronder de coöperatieve Frontier Defense-modus. Titanfall 2 is inmiddels dus een prachtig pakket voor bij de Xbox One X, en hier kun je lezen waarom Lucas de game bij lancering een 8,5 gaf . 
Gears of War 4 Gears of War 4 is een vrij unieke game als het om de Xbox One X gaat. Het is namelijk een van de weinige titels die een verbeterde framerate krijgt, naast een upgrade naar 4K. Bezitters van een 4K-televisie kunnen de game in volledig 4K afspelen in de daarvoor bestemde modus, waarbij de hogere resolutie textures van de pc-versie worden gebruikt. Aan de andere kant kunnen spelers ervoor kiezen de game in 1080p en 60fps te spelen. Als kers op de taart heeft The Coalition in beide modi betere kijkafstanden, dynamische schaduwen en verbeterd licht toegevoegd. Ook draait de Versus-modus nog eens op 60fps en in een dynamische resolutie van maximaal 4K. 
Ook Gears of War is inmiddels alweer een jaartje oud en ondertussen is de game flink aangepast. Iedere maand roteert een selectie van de 26 maps, zonder dat hier een season pass of betaalde dlc voor nodig is. Ook worden er regelmatig nog speciale evenementen gehouden. Sowieso waren we blij met de terugkeer van Marcus Fenix in de singleplayer-modus. Lees hier waarom Gears of War 4 wellicht een prachtige aanvulling is op de Xbox One X, mocht je de game nog niet gespeeld hebben. Nog even geduld Dit zijn een aantal van de best geoptimaliseerde games voor Microsofts krachtpatser. Hoewel er is aangekondigd dat meer dan 160 games een patch krijgen, ligt dit aantal bij lancering rond de 70. Games waarvan we weten dat ze een update krijgen zullen er deze week dus nog niet meteen zo gelikt uitzien als je zou denken, dus houd dat in het achterhoofd als je de console aanschaft. 
De Xbox One X verschijnt op 7 november. Lees hier de recensie van Dennis .   09:50 door

posts.title: Phát hiện đường dây mua bán súng qua Facebook
posts.text: Phát hiện đường dây mua bán súng qua Facebook Thứ Ba, 07/11/2017 08:13 GMT+7 Ngày 6/11, Phòng Cảnh sát hình sự (PC45), Công an TP.HCM cho biết, đơn vị này vừa triệt phá thành công đường dây mua bán trái phép vũ khí quân dụng qua mạng xã hội, thu giữ hàng chục khẩu súng các loại, hàng trăm viên đạn và nhiều vật liệu chế tạo súng, kíp nổ… Súng rulo là loại mà Phúc thường cung cấp cho khách hàng - ẢNH: C.T.V Ông trùm của đường dây trên là Nguyễn Hồng Phúc, 33 tuổi, quê Vĩnh Long. Theo đó, thông qua Facebook, Phúc trực tiếp liên hệ với các “đầu nậu” trên Facebook để mua súng. Sau đó, về giao lại cho đàn em là Lê Ngọc Mãi (16 tuổi, quê Đồng Tháp) tìm mối bán lại để kiếm lời. Trong tháng 8.2017, Mãi nhiều lần bán súng, đạn cho nhiều “anh chị” ở các tỉnh Gia Lai, TP.HCM, Tiền Giang… thu về cho hàng chục triệu đồng. Hình thức giao dịch là Mãi sẽ trực tiếp mang hàng nóng đến điểm hẹn. Rồi để cho khách hàng thử súng và nhận tiền mang về cho Phúc. Loại hàng nóng mà khách hàng thường đặt trên Faebook của Mãi là súng rulo, đạn. Sau nhiều giao dịch, thưởng cho Mãi 1 khẩu súng bắn đạn bi, 1 khẩu súng bắn đạn diêm và 1,5 triệu đồng. Chiều 12/10, sau nhiều tháng điều nghiên, bằng biện pháp nghiệp vụ, PC45 xác định ông “trùm” Phúc đang ẩn nấp ở nhà vợ tại H.Măng Thít (tỉnh Vĩnh Long) nên trinh sát lên kế hoạch truy bắt. Chiều 12/10, Phúc mang theo túi xách, đón xe khách lên TP.HCM giao hàng thì bị trinh sát PC45 Công an TP.HCM phối hợp với PC45, Công an tỉnh Vĩnh Long bắt quả tang khi xe vừa xuất phát. Kiểm tra túi xách của Phúc, công an thu giữ 1 quả lựu đạn, 3 khẩu súng rulo, 1 ống giảm thanh, 1 khẩu súng tự chế, 7 viên đạn, 5 vỏ đạn… Đến ngày 18/10, Công an TP.HCM phối hợp cùng Công an Đồng Tháp bắt giữ Mãi. Tại cơ quan điều tra, Phúc khai nhận thường xuyên giao dịch mua “hàng nóng” của Khúc Chí Tài (17 tuổi, ngụ H.Hóc Môn, TP.HCM). Ngày 20/10, các trinh sát thuộc Đội 3, PC45 phối hợp với Công an H.Hóc Môn bắt giữ Tài tại nhà riêng ở xã Bà Điểm. Tại cơ quan điều tra, Tài khai nhận mình cũng là người mua đi bán lại. Và ngoài Phúc, thì thông qua Facebook, Tài còn bán “hàng nóng” cho nhiều người khác; đặc biệt là “bạn hàng” tên Mai Quang Vinh (ngụ H.Bình Chánh, TP.HCM). Từ lời khai của Tài, chiều 21/10, các trinh sát cũng bắt giữ Minh khi nghi can này đang “phê” ma túy tại nhà riêng. Trước đó, ngày 14/10, các trinh sát thuộc lực lượng PC45 Công an TP.HCM phối hợp cùng Công an xã Phú Sơn tiến hành khám xét khu rẫy của Phúc nằm sâu trong rừng ở thôn Sơn Lang (xã Phú Sơn, H.Bù Đăng, Bình Phước), thu giữ nhiều loại súng, đạn và vật dụng dùng để chế tạo súng, mìn, lựu đạn... Đây chính là “đại bản doanh” Phúc dùng để cất giấu, chế tạo vũ khí. Công an còn kiểm tra căn nhà của vợ chồng Phúc ở thị trấn Đức Phong (H.Bù Đăng) và thu giữ nhiều bộ phận của súng, công cụ, vật liệu chế tạo súng, kíp nổ… Hiện vụ việc đang được cơ quan chức năng điều tra làm rõ. Theo Đàm Huy - Đức Tiến/ Thanh niên

thread.title: 《了不起的兽人族》郑恺挑战鸵鸟王祖蓝竟挑战长颈鹿？_娱乐_环球网
thread.title_full: 《了不起的兽人族》郑恺挑战鸵鸟王祖蓝竟挑战长颈鹿？_娱乐_环球网

posts.title: 《了不起的兽人族》郑恺挑战鸵鸟王祖蓝竟挑战长颈鹿？_娱乐_环球网
posts.text:
合照 王祖蓝 
你见过艺人们不顾形象的模仿动物吗？你见过他们头穿丝袜的囧样吗？你见过造型独特同时又高难度的竞技游戏吗？全国首档动物仿生策略游戏类纯网真人秀节目《了不起的兽人族》将于11月11日晚8点登陆。郑恺、王祖蓝化身“兽人族首领”，将带领刘维、张赫、徐子珊、金刚等“兽人”学习并模仿动物的特性和技能，进行仿生游戏竞技。 
在第一期节目中，兽人家族便迎来了史上难度系数最高的游戏，红蓝两队也上演了一番相爱相杀的实力与逗趣的对决。 
河马拉便便时，小尾巴像螺旋桨一样旋转，把便便甩到池塘里和其他河马脸上。节目中需要兽人屁股戴上装有乒乓球的透明盒子像河马一样旋转，将盒子里的乒乓球甩出。陈若轩、徐子珊在此任务环节，竟然直呼“不雅”？ 
“鼻孔发射器”：史上最“恶心”游戏 
大象的鼻子是强力喷水管，可以用喷水的方式防御蚊虫叮咬，具有一定的威力。兽人需要像大象那样用鼻孔内的“子弹”将转盘上的水瓶全部击倒即为成功。看似简单，但是却让自称“游戏王”的金刚频频失败。 
“高跷躲气球”：史上最紧张游戏 
鸵鸟拥有一双粗壮的大长腿。虽然是二肢鸟类，却能支撑庞大的身躯。兽人需要脚踩高跷像鸵鸟一样走路，由于高跷难以控制，让郑恺屡屡摔得四脚朝天，有“小猎豹”之称的他在完成此任务时也是心惊胆战。 
“丝袜甩甩甩”：史上最丑游戏 
长颈鹿喜欢以力示人，采取搏斗的形式，疯狂甩动脖子攻击对方，证明领袖地位。兽人头部穿戴定制丝袜，像长颈鹿一样狂甩脖子用丝袜球将桌面的空瓶打入规定区域。王祖蓝作为兽人族蓝队兽领，自然要更拼命，多次转动头部不仅将自己转晕了，还反被打头，不仅如此，头穿丝袜的他竟然还被刘维吐槽“太丑了”。 
“袋鼠脱袜子”：史上最痛游戏 
袋鼠不会行走只会跳跃，是滞空能力最强的哺乳动物。兽人需要站在指压板像一只袋鼠一样跳绳，在以往综艺节目中都有良好表现的刘维，这一次却打了退堂鼓，痛得直呼“想回家”。 
“单杠吃玉米”：史上最苦游戏 
黑熊虽然笨重，但上肢用力，会利用上肢力量爬到高处取蜂蜜。兽人必须像棕熊一样通过强大的臂力支撑将挂在单杠上的玉米吃完方可过关。郑恺虽然经常健身，但是在面对单杠生柠檬、生苦瓜时，他都想放弃？ 责编：王清妍

There is always some shiny new marketing idea, media or strategy being presented as the next big thing. I admit I’m easily distracted by cool, new techno-wizardry or the latest marketing fad and at times am overwhelmed by sheer choice. But experience has taught me there is truly nothing new under the sun. When faced with countless choices of apps, software, tools, fads and experts, there is an easy way to take the mystery out of new marketing ideas and instantly figure out if it’s of any use. I’ll share that in a moment First, a quick story on one of these hot ‘new’ marketing topics illustrates how what’s old is new again. The new guise I’m talking about is “content marketing.” According to Wikipedia, content marketing refers to the “creation and sharing of media and publishing content in order to acquire customers.” To this end the content marketer delivers “consistent, valuable information” to the prospective and current customer through a wide variety of media. 
I’ll wager that you immediately think ‘online’ when you hear ‘content marketing.’ Even Wikipedia magnetic-marketing325.jpgmentions the use of “news, video, white papers, e-books, infographics, case studies, how-to guides, question and answer articles, photos,” and more, most of which are delivered digitally. Yet often in cases like this the only thing that’s new is the media (how it’s delivered.) The underlying concept is, you’ll see, as old as the hills. 
It’s interesting that the evolution of printing technology itself—better and faster ways of putting ink on paper—gave rise to the original content marketing in print. Here are some classic examples. 
Jell-O® began distributing free cookbooks, recipe pamphlets and samples door-to-door in 1904 in an effort to lift sluggish sales. Of course these included dessert recipes that promoted their product. Orator Woodward, the owner, originally purchased the rights to Jell-O® for $450 a few years prior. Frustration with slow sales prompted him to offer the product rights to the plant superintendent for $35 when he decided to try this no-name method of marketing. By 1906 they were doing $1 million annually, or about $25 million in today’s dollars, thanks to content marketing in its printed form. (No, he did not sell the rights!) 
Going further back to 1895, John Deere started its own magazine called The Furrow. It delivered tips to farmers on how to make more money and be more productive. The company celebrated 175 years in 2012 and does about $33 billion annually. It still publishes The Furrow, sending it to a list of 1.5 million readers in 40 countries. 
Another famous example is the Michelin Guide. It was originally a free travel tip guide for automotive travelers which began distribution in 1900. The idea was to boost demand for cars, car travel, and subsequently tires. Then there’s Buyer’s Guide Place started by a photography/electronics store named Magnolia in 1954. Their goal was to teach prospective customers how to buy electronic items wisely. Magnolia later sold out to Best Buy for $87 million. 
That’s the ongoing power of content marketing. Provide something of value to prospective clients on a regular basis. They get to know you, trust you, and understand what you have to offer. If you’re talking to the right prospects, when the time is right, they’ll buy something from you. 
It’s not complicated. It’s definitely not new. It’s simply a marketing strategy that gets a new name every few years. Business author Dan Kennedy called it magnetic marketing…more than 20 years ago. Another name for it is inbound marketing. (That’s hot now too.) The gist is that you are attracting customers to you rather than promoting through advertising and other ‘outbound’ methods. 
Don’t get me wrong. There is no single right or wrong way to promote a business. My point is that if you ignore content marketing, especially in print, you are losing significant business. 
So what’s my secret to taking the mystery out of countless marketing ideas and fads? I picture my ideal customer and my plan to attract, get to know, and do business with them. Then regarding that shiny new marketing object I simply ask, “Will this help me accomplish any of that?” 
When I first started reading about the content marketing sensation, I laughed because I have been doing it for years and getting great results. I didn’t even have to ask my shiny object question. Our primary media for delivering content is the printed newsletter along with an enewsletter. Second to that we use every oth 
It’s proven to work in any business. Just look at our industry examples above. We have tires, food, farm equipment, electronics and printing. It’s not a fad and it can be productive for decades at a time. 
Remember too that your reader will find value in a wide variety of content. Yes, we deliver industry-specific content in order to help our readers. Yet we know that they also value a good laugh, a bit of light distraction and personal development tips as much or more than the industry content itself. 
So be sure to reach out on a regular basis, in as many ways as you can. Content marketing, especially in print, instantly sets you apart from your competitors. Make it a part of your marketing plan for attracting your ideal customer.

posts.text:
1.问：大一在读学生可以申请开留学证明吗？9年前曾在昆州读书，因特殊原因没有开具回国证明，可以补办吗？ 
答：根据教育部相关规定，在昆州正规高等教育机构学习并获得Diploma及以上学历或学位、访问进修期限在6个月以上，计划近期回国或已经回国工作的留学人员可提交《留学回国人员证明》申请。该申请应在获得相关学历或学位后1年内提出。 
2.问：学位认证如何办理？需要准备什么资料？需要象办理留学证明一样预约吗？在哪里预约？ 
答：如您需要办理学位认证，您可直接于工作日上午9:00~12:00前来总领馆办理，无需预约。办理学位认证所需材料如下： 
1)《公证、认证申请表》1份；

posts.author: ntamil
posts.title: வடகொரியாவின் ஏவுகணைகளை அமெரிக்க ஆயுதங்கள் மூலம் ஜப்பான் விரட்டி அடிக்கும்: – டிரம்ப்
posts.text:
உலகம் வடகொரியாவின் ஏவுகணைகளை அமெரிக்க ஆயுதங்கள் மூலம் ஜப்பான் விரட்டி அடிக்கும்: – டிரம்ப்   7, 2017 in   24,582 
அமெரிக்கவின் அதிபராக பொறுப்பேற்ற பின்னர் கிழக்காசிய நாடுகளுக்கு முதன் முறையாக டொனால்ட் டிரம்ப் சுற்றுப்பயணம் மேற்கொண்டுள்ளார். ஜப்பான், தென்கொரியா, சீனா ஆகிய நாடுகளுக்கு செல்லும் அவர் வியட்நாம் மற்றும் பிலிப்பைன்ஸில் நடைபெற உள்ள ஆசிய ஒத்துழைப்பு உச்சிமாநாடுகளில் பங்கேற்கிறார். 
தனது பயணத்தில் முதல் நாடாக ஜப்பான் சென்றுள்ள டிரம்ப் அந்நாட்டின் பிரதமர் ஷின்சோ அபே உடன் பேச்சுவார்த்தை நடத்தினார். பேச்சுவார்த்தையின் போது வடகொரியாவின் ஏவுகணை அச்சுறுத்தல் தொடர்பாக முக்கிய முடிவுகள் எடுக்கப்பட்டதாக தகவல்கள் தெரிவிக்கின்றன.பேச்சுவார்த்தை முடிந்த பின்னர் டிரம்ப் – அபே இருவரும் கூட்டாக செய்தியாளர்களை சந்தித்தனர். அப்போது, ‘வடகொரியாவின் எந்த அச்சுறுத்தலையும் எதிர்கொள்ள ஜப்பான் முழுஅளவில் தயாராக உள்ளது. தேவைப்பட்டால் வடகொரியாவின் ஏவுகணைகளை வீழ்த்துவோம். அமெரிக்காவிடமிருந்து பெரிய தொகைக்கு ராணுவ உபகரணங்கள் வாங்கப்பட உள்ளது’ என ஜப்பான் பிரதமர் ஷின்சோ அபே பேசினார். 
இதனையடுத்து பேசிய டிரம்ப், ‘அமெரிக்காவிடமிருந்து வாங்கப்பட்ட ஆயுதங்கள் மூலம் வடகொரியாவின் ஏவுகணைகளை ஜப்பான் வானத்தை விட்டு வெளியே விரட்டியடிக்கும்.’ என குறிப்பிட்டார். மேலும், ஜப்பான் மற்றும் தென்கொரியா அதிகளவிலான நவீன ஆயுதங்களை வாங்குவதற்கு அனுமதி அளித்துள்ளேன் என தனது ட்விட்டர் பக்கத்தில் அவர் பதிவிட்டுள்ளார்.கடந்த சில மாதங்களுக்கு முன்னர் இரண்டு முறை ஜப்பான் பகுதிகளுக்கு மேலாக தனது ஏவுகணைகளை வடகொரியா சோதித்தது குறிப்பிடத்தக்கது.

posts.title: وظائف إدارية شاغرة لدى الزامل القابضة بالخبر
posts.text:
وظائف إدارية شاغرة لدى الزامل القابضة بالخبر وظائف إدارية شاغرة لدى الزامل القابضة بالخبر 2017/11/07 طباعة المواطن- خالد الأحمد 
أعلنت شركة مجموعة الزامل القابضة- عبر موقعها الإلكتروني- عن توفّر وظائف إدارية شاغرة للسعوديين، لحمَلة درجة البكالوريوس في عدد من التخصصات، وذلك للعمل بفروع الشركات التابعة لها في محافظة الخبر. 
وأبرزت الشركة، أن الوظائف المتاحة على مسمى: 
– مسؤول العقارات والممتلكات: درجة البكالوريوس في تخصص إدارة الأعمال. 
– مدير المرافق: درجة البكالوريوس في تخصصات: (الهندسة المدنية، الميكانيكية، والكهربائية). 
وأوضحت الشركة، أن التقديم متاح عبر موقعها الإلكتروني للتوظيف، وذلك بدءًا من تاريخ 6 نوفمبر 2017م، والتقديم مستمر حتى تاريخ 6 فبراير 2018م. 
وللتقديم ومعرفة تفاصيل شروط الوظائف المُعلنة؛ الدخول على الرابط التالي: ( هنا ).

thread.title: Un hombre se encarama a la fachada de la Catedral de Murcia
thread.title_full: Un hombre se encarama a la fachada de la Catedral de Murcia

posts.author: EUROPA PRESS / VÍDEO: POLICÍA LOCAL DE MURCIA
posts.title: Un hombre se encarama a la fachada de la Catedral de Murcia
posts.text:
Un hombre se encarama a la fachada de la Catedral de Murcia Amenaza con lanzarse al vacío si no se le proporciona un abogado tras haber sido supuestamente estafado. ECO   PRESS / VÍDEO: POLICÍA LOCAL DE MURCIA. 07.11.2017 
Un hombre, cuya identidad no ha trascendido, se ha encaramado este martes a primera hora a la fachada de la Catedral de Murcia y ha amenazado con lanzarse al vacío si no se le proporcionaba un abogado tras haber sido supuestamente estafado, según ha podido saber Europa Press. Imágenes 1 Foto 
El suceso ha tenido lugar pasadas las 9.00 horas, cuando el individuo, al parecer de origen rumano, se ha encaramado a la fachada de la Catedral y ha amenazado con tirarse a la plaza del Cardenal Belluga porque, supuestamente, le habían estafado . 
La Policía Local de Murcia y la Policía Nacional han establecido rápidamente un dispositivo de seguridad, acordonando la zona y cortando los accesos a la plaza del Cardenal Belluga. Asimismo, se han desplegado ambulancias y efectivos de Bomberos . Los efectivos de seguridad están mediando con el individuo para tratar de que deponga su actitud. Desplegado operativo junto @AVPCMurcia y @BomberosMurcia por hombre encaramado en la fachada Catedral #Murcia desde las 9 h. pic.twitter.com/X70vu0CjcQ

thread.title: Chronique des ZAD octobre 2017 - Première partie
thread.title_full: Chronique des ZAD octobre 2017 - Première partie

posts.author: noreply@blogger.com (café repaire)
posts.title: Chronique des ZAD octobre 2017 - Première partie
posts.text: Chronique des ZAD octobre 2017 - Première partie En deux parties ce mois-ci Des infos, des liens, des photos pour tout savoir (ou presque) sur ce qu'il s'est passé dans/autour des ZAD (Zones A Défendre) pendant ce mois d'octobre 2017 ; on y parle de Notre Dame Des Landes, de Bure, d'EuropaCity et de plein d'autres sujets. Merci à l'auteur, membre du Collectif de Soutien NDDL66, pour cette compilation mensuelle précieuse. PROJET D’AYRAULT – PORT de NOTRE DAME DES LANDES (44) Source : ZAD.nadir.org et médias Et ailleurs : GCO à Strasbourg (67) - Bure (55) - ZAD de Roybon (38) - Europa city (95) - A 45 (42) - Surveillance : docu *Nothing to Hide* - Projet d'oléoduc Vinci au Canada - Amassada (12) - Calais (62) - Rémi Fraisse/Sivens (82) - Vallée de la Roya (06) - ZAD de Tosu (Bizkaia Espagne) - THT Haute Durance (05) - ZAD de NDDL - 44 Infos du 1er au 8 octobre Samedi 7 octobre La première pleine lune d’octobre nous aurait-elle trop enthousiasmé qu’on en aurait oublié le site, la toile, le reste du monde ? Peut-être, et c’est tout l’intérêt et l’inconvénient de vivre dans un microcosme. Mais on n’est jamais très loin ! Les récoltes vont bon train, cette semaine nous a offert un temps clément et quelques heures encore chouettes et plaisantes dans les jardins. Les prochaines rencontres se préparent doucement, que ce soit celles du 21 octobre ou celles qui viendront ensuite... Et puis on continue de chercher ensemble ce qui fait sens commun , et ce qui fait conflit,, et comment on fait ensemble avec tout ça. Et ça, ça prend du temps... La bonne nuit ! PS : dans les bonnes blagues de la semaine, on a reçu ça , on a bien ri ! Infos du 9 au 15 octobre Mercredi 11 octobre ► Luttes paysannes A l’occasion de la Fête des récoltes, samedi 30 septembre, Yannick Ogor est venu présenter ici son livre "Le paysan impossible". La discussion a été enregistrée et peut donc être écoutée ici , merci Radio klaxon ! Avec un rdv du "collectif d’agriculteurs contre les normes" les 28-29 octobre du côté de Mâcon. Pour les contacter : hors.norme@yahoo.com. Jeudi 12 octobre Témoignage d’une nouvelle arrivante Je suis arrivée il y a un mois en camtar, avec mon copain et un pote. On a débarqué un peu tard le soir et on a été accueillis à la ferme de Bellevue qui nous ont proposé un repas vegan, et on a dormi dans le sleeping. On est restées une semaine. La ZAD, de l’extérieur, j’étais loin d’imaginer ce que c’était. En peu de temps, j’ai appris beaucoup de choses comme carder et laver de la laine, récolter des haricots, faire de la crème de marrons, différencier les champignons et les plantes médicinales. J’ai visité plusieurs lieux : les 100 noms, la Grée, les Fosses Noires… Et je continue mon tour de la ZAD pour m’enrichir de tout ce qui s’y passe en attendant de trouver ma place. Ce qui m’a le plus frappé ici, c’est les rencontres, les liens riches qui se tissent en parfois si peu de temps. Des gens géniaux venants de pleins d’horizons différents qui ont un rêve en commun et qui se battent pour le construire ensemble. Un récit des récoltes d’automne Ces dernières semaines, c’était pour celleux d’entre nous qui sont impliquées dans les cultures le moment des récoltes. Arrachage manuel du champ collectif de haricots puis mise en tas dans le hangar des vaches, pas loin des gerbes de lin stockées au grenier depuis le mois d’août. Installation de la vieille batteuse à courroie dans la cour de Bellevue, pendant que des camarades installant la scène et les barnums pour la fête des récoltes. Pendant ce temps une camarade référente d’une culture de tournesol s’affaire à faire marcher le séchoir pour la récolte qui est trop humide et risque de pourrir, tandis que l’équipe sarrasin essaie de caler la venue de la moissonneuse batteuse, la grosse machine moderne cette fois entre deux averses. On a peur de la pluie, alors on couvre la batteuse avec un gros barnum en métal qui servira à rien parce que finalement il ne pleut pas. Battage des haricots et du lin, mais aussi d’un peu de soja et de pois chiches avec une chouette équipe pour filer un coup de main. Quand on a presque fini, le vieux tracteur qui tombe en panne, zut on devra finir demain, mais finalement on réussit à le réparer et à finir avant la nuit. Après on mange des burgers végétaliens avec des frites des patates de la ZAD préparées par des camarades d’une cantine venue d’un peu plus loin, et discussions, et danse, et il est tard. Et puis la galère de tout ranger sous la pluie le lendemain quand on est fatigué-e-s, et de faire sécher les haricots blancs trop humides – heureusement les marrons vont bien et c’est les plus nombreux. Finalement une semaine plus tard le tournesol est sauvé, et le sarrasin récolté, et on galère un peu à ressemer des engrais verts et des prairies sur toutes les parcelles gérées collectivement. Pas mal de monde est occupé à essayer de construire la suite pour que quand on gagne contre l’aéroport, ces dynamiques puissent continuer. Grand sujet en ce moment qui occupe pas mal de monde, fait l’objet de pas mal d’enthousiasme mais aussi de conflits sur la façon d’y arriver, les priorités, les limites... Envie qu’il continue à y avoir de la place pour toutes les formes d’agricultures collectives non-marchandes ou plus classiques, pour les bois et les friches aussi, pour tou-te-s les habitant-e-s, occupant-e-s ou historiques, et pour tou-te-s celleux qui n’ont leur place nulle part dans ce monde. ► NDDL Notre pauvre ministre de l’environnement a peur de se faire battre par son boss : « Je ne veux pas m’exprimer sur Notre-Dame-des-Landes parce que je vais encore me faire engueuler. On va me dire : Tu n’es pas neutre. » . Mais il a « ce point focus en fin d’année, je le regarderai quand le problème ou la solution arrivera » (source : Presse Océan ). ► Collectif syndical contre l’aéroport Aéroport nantais : la lowcostitude a frappé vient d’ ê tre publié par le collectif syndical contre l’aéroport et son monde : « A Nantes, la précarité des personnels au sol permet les billets à prix cassé et les grand profits de Vinci, qui joue la montre en attendant des lois du travail allégées. » Aéroport nantais: la lowcostitude a frappé A Nantes, la précarité des personnels au sol permet les billets à prix cassé et les grand profits de Vinci, qui joue la montre en attendant des lois du travail allégées. Le billet d'avion à pas cher a ses dessous de tarmac. Le personnel au sol, à Nantes comme ailleurs, en fait les frais, son exploitation et la précarité forcée garantissant aux consommateurs des tarifs improbables de vols low cost. On est en plein air du temps. Ça se passe sur le site de l'actuel aéroport de Nantes, géré par Vinci qui en a la concession depuis 2011, avant un nouvel aéroport à Notre Dame des landes qui ne sortira peut être jamais des prairies en bocage. « La reprise de la concession de l’aéroport par le groupe Vinci en 2011 a changé beaucoup de choses » explique la CGT Aéroport Grand Ouest qui syndique les salariés des différentes entreprises intervenant sur le site de l’actuel aéroport de Nantes Atlantique. Le paradoxe, c'est que questions profits, le ciel est sans nuages. Le temps est au beau fixe. Aucun ruissellement, en théorie ou en pratique, ne distribue ces profits aux salarié·es. Profits au beau fixe, emploi au beau souple L'activité de cet aéroport de Nantes qui affiche 14 % de croissance en 2016, sans doute plus en 2017, est florissante. La société Vinci qui gère cette machine à profit a décidé d'investir depuis peu dans de nouveaux parkings avions, d'agrandir la zone de filtrage avant les salles d’embarquement et d'octroyer 200 m3 de stockage supplémentaire en augmentant la capacité de son dépôt de carburant. Si Vinci en tire de gros bénéfices, les entreprises implantées sur le site et qui font tourner le service aéroportuaire vont mal. Outre les contrats précaires en pagaille et le turnover important qu'ils génèrent, on constate des cadences infernales suite à l’augmentation du trafic et l’implantation de multiples compagnies low cost. « Un billet d'avion à moins de 30 euros engendre des conditions de travail exécrables, des salaires au rabais, des employé·es jetables, un mal-être au travail, tout ça dans un silence assourdissant » rappelle la CGT AGO, qui se heurte à un mur, empêchée de discuter avec le grand donneur d'ordre du site, Vinci, qui refuse de rencontrer les représentants des salarié·es « qui veulent simplement exprimer leurs difficultés au quotidien, et être entendu·es afin de travailler si possible dans des conditions décentes et dignes. » Aviapartner dans le rouge, salarié·es dans le noir Malgré la hausse de 14 % du trafic en 2016, Aviapartner, société d’assistance aéroportuaire dont le siège est à Zaventem, en Belgique et qui opère dans pas mal d'aéroports européens, est en difficulté. Aviapartner Nantes a réalisé près de 10 millions de chiffre d'affaire en 2016, mais son principal client, EasyJet, l'a lâchée pour aller chercher encore moins cher. Aviapartner emploie à Nantes quelques 180 bagagistes et hôtesses d'escale, aux comptoirs d'enregistrement et pour accompagner les passager au pied de l'avion. La société est en procédure de sauvegarde économique depuis décembre 2015. Un transfert de personnel est annoncé pour début novembre 2017, a priori au profit d’une autre compagnie d’assistance toujours plus low cost, avec donc des conditions de travail encore pires. Les conditions de transfert sont opaques pour les salarié·es. Combien seront repris·es, à quelle conditions de salaire, quel indice d’ancienneté ? Mystère. Ils et elles seront pourtant légitimement en droit d’attendre des informations de la part de leur employeur dans son deal avec la société repreneuse. Loi travail XXL avant l'heure Si une chose est bien visible, c'est bien la politique répressive ciblant les syndicalistes. La direction d’Aviapartner veut licencier la secrétaire du CHSCT. Impossible a répondu l’inspection du travail qui a émis un avis défavorable. Peu importe cette étape pour l'employeur qui a introduit un recours au plus haut, auprès du ministère du travail. Muriel Pénicaud, ancienne DRH chez Danone et administratrice des Aéroports de Paris, mais aussi d'Orange et de la SNCF, devrait y prêter une oreille attentive. Tant qu'à faire, lors de la réunion du prochain CHSCT à la fin du mois d'octobre, la direction d'Aviapartner a prévu de dénoncer tous les accords d’entreprise. Le ton, déjà bien donné, est plus que dans l'air du temps. « Et si la direction de Vinci Airport de l'aéroport de Nantes fait la sourde oreille, malgré les sollicitations des syndicats, c'est bien qu'elle compte jouer la montre en espérant la mise en place des ordonnances de la loi travil XXL », souligne la CGT AGO. Voilà un exemple cinglant des conséquences de la loi El Khomri. Qu’en sera-t-il quand les ordonnances Macron et sa loi travail XXL seront applicables ? Les licenciements facilités, des syndicats muselés, des décisions arbitraires… Le fond de l'air effraie.

thread.title_full: ¿Pedirá Marcelino fichajes en invierno?

posts.author: Superdeporte
posts.title: ¿Pedirá Marcelino fichajes en invierno?
posts.text:
ACTUALIDAD ¿Pedirá Marcelino fichajes en invierno? El entrenador del Valencia asegura que la plantilla es corta pero que ahora no tiene claro si conviene fichar, además, dice que no se ve entrenando al Real Madrid o al FC Barcelona carlos bosch 07.11.2017 | 16:53 ¿Pedirá Marcelino fichajes en invierno? 
El entrenador del Valencia CF , Marcelino García Toral ha asegurado que no sabe todavía que si pedirá fichajes para el marcado de invierno, "no lo tengo claro", al tiempo que admite que la plantilla es "corta". En una entrevista concedida al programa radiofónico El Transistor de Onda Cero , el técnico valencianista asegura que no ve entrenando al Real Madrid o al FC Barcelona al tiempo que se reitera en sus buenas palabras hacia el delantero italiano Simone Zaza , como ya hizo en rueda de prensa tras la victoria del pasado sábado ante el Legané s , "es muy noble", afirma. 
Estas son las respuestas del entrenador del conjunto de Mestalla . 
Peter Lim: "Fue muy agradable, me dijo que me daba total confianza en la toma de decisiones". 
Gonçalo Guedes: "Lo había visto en el Benfica y Emery nos echó una mano. Unai tiene buena relación con el Valencia. Pensaba que iba a ser bueno pero la adaptación siempre es una incógnita". 
Calendario en el inicio del campeonato : "Cuando salió pensé, ´a ver si me como los turrones€". 
Parejo y los cinco kilos que ha perdido desde su llegada : "No le dije que tenía que bajar 5 kilos, yo con Dani solo hablo de fútbol. Es un tema del nutricionista". 
Habrá fichajes en el mercado invernal?: "Tenemos una plantilla corta, dijimos que tiraríamos de los chavales de la cantera y es lo que estamos haciendo. Estamos encantados con todos. Veremos si pedimos refuerzos en invierno, no lo tenemos claro. Los entrenadores sabemos que dependemos de los futbolistas, por eso intentamos hacer un grupo humano, no solo vale el talento". 
El primero que se hizo este verano fue el de Neto. Lo primordial era fichar dos centrales y un mediocentro. Con Kondogbia hablamos a través del representante y le convencimos de que viniera". 
: "Había dudas con los delanteros por el rendimiento de la pasada temporada. Pero apostamos por ellos y les dimos confianza". 
: " Zaza es muy pasional, se cabrea cuando le cambias y a los 10 minutos está tranquilamente hablando contigo. Zaza tiene muy buena relación con todos los compañeros y cuerpo técnico, es muy noble". 
Da explicaciones a un futbolista cuando no juega o lo cambia?: "Doy explicaciones a un jugador si no juega si creo que debo darlas". 
Puede el Valencia ganar la Liga?: Ganar la liga es prácticamente imposible. Es llegar a 90 puntos y creo no está al alcance del Valencia. Firmo ahora mismo un cuarto puesto". 
ía a Madrid o Barça : "No me veo en Real Madrid o Barcelona, ellos fichan a entrenadores muy grandes o a sus exfutbolistas".

posts.text: HABER ÖZETI Irak Kürt Bölgesel Yönetimi'nin (IKBY) eski lideri Mesut Barzani, görev süresinin dolmasından sonra ilk kez konuştu. Barzani, 25 Eylül'de yaptıkları bağımsızlık referandumu kararından pişman olmadıklarını kaydederek, referandum sonrasında ABD ile ilişkileri yeniden değerlendireceğini söyledi. Barzani, referanduma Rusya'nın pozitif baktığını da ifade ederek, Belki de Ruslar ABD'den daha iyi bir dost olabilirlerdedi. Ama bu silahları insanlar üzerinde kullandılar ve Amerika sessiz kaldı.

posts.text:
更名后的他们怎么样了？生源增加，招生分数线提高
高校更名潮每年都会来一波，然而学校更名并不只是单纯的换个好听大气的名字，而是跟政府教育资源投放、学校硬件建设、学科设置以及招生宣传等一系列直接挂钩。
如根据教育部规定，由“学院”升格为“大学”，在校生规模应从5000人以上，上升到8000人以上，同时，至少有一半教师具有硕士学历，五分之一教师则需要有博士学历。一些学校更名后，可以增加重点本科专业数量，有资格申请更多科研项目、设立博士点等等。那江苏这些年更名的大学在换了名字后效果如何？ 本帖评分记录 goodluck938 昆币 +5 - 2小时前 共 1 条评分 ， 昆币 +5 关注昆山论坛微信公众号bbskshot，轻松在线查违章、查公交、查学区、查天气 不温不火，不作不做，敬天，敬地，敬小人 引用 举报

He officially opened the factory in the town of Sombo, Dibang Subdivision on Friday November 3, 2017. posts.title: أمين الجميل: لا بد من التعاون للوصول الى مخرج للأزمة
posts.text: +T أكد الرئيس أمين الجميل بعد زيارته الرئيس العماد ميشال عون في قصر بعبدا أننا "نمر بمرحلة بغاية الصعوبة وجذور هذه الأزمة يعود الى زمن طويل وهي ترجمة لمسار طويل". وقال :"كل تسوية لها اجل، ومن هنا تقدم الرئيس سعد الحريري باستقالته، وانا لا أحسده". وأضاف: "لا بد من التعاون للوصول الى مخرج ينهي الازمة، ونسمع كلاما من فريق انتصر في المنطقة، وكأن المطلوب من لبنان أن يدفع ثمن هذه الإنتصارات، ونحن على من انتصرنا إذا؟ على لبنان؟". وتابع: "يجب ألا يدفع لبنان فواتير انتصارات لا دخل له بها، والمطلوب حياد لبنان واستقلاله". التعليقات

posts.text:
2010至2016年，江苏至少有13所学校更名，其中包括，
2010年，江苏工业学院更名为常州大学；
2011年，徐州幼儿师范学校升级更名为徐州幼儿师范高等专科学校，
徐州师范大学更名为江苏师范大学 ；
2012年江苏技术师范学院更名为江苏理工学院，
南京联合职工大学升级更名为南京城市职业学院，
徐州生物工程职业技术学院被批准筹建；
2013年，江苏广播电视大学更名为江苏开放大学，
江苏 教育 学院改制升级为江苏第二师范学院，
泰州师范高等专科学校更名为泰州学院；
2015年， 苏州 科技学院更名为苏州科技大学，
南京审计学院更名为南京审计大学，
淮阴师范学院和淮安工学院合并为淮安大学；
2016年， 徐州医学院更名为徐州医科大学 。 本帖评分记录 lition 昆币 +1 - 昨天 08:50 goodluck938 昆币 +5 - 昨天 07:32 共 2 条评分 ， 昆币 +6

posts.title: 天猫双11真是要上天 无人机编队跨海快递只为了6箱水果_无人机_环球网
posts.text:
执行此次飞行的机型载重可达7公斤，应对6级风。技术团队专家介绍，由于技术成熟，无人机会按照编程航线自动飞向既定地点降落。 
中国气象局的天气数据显示，当日该海域风力4～5级，阵风6～7级，风高浪大，让海峡间的轮渡都颠簸不已，更是加大了无人机飞行的难度。 
31日12时许，无人机顶部的六支螺旋桨高速旋转。距海面50米的上空，三角形编队拉开阵势，向海域深处进发。 
经过约9分钟、近5公里的跨海飞行，无人机安全降落在湄洲岛。 
恶劣天气，编队协同飞行，精准降落，无人机飞行的困难和障碍都被跨越。监控数据显示，此次飞行全程状态平稳。 
哪怕天涯海角 也能享受电商果实 
不仅如此，这次飞行全程“可视”：在后台控制中心，所有飞行动作可监视、可控制，易于管理。跨海飞行最大的困难和挑战是海面复杂的气象条件，稳定可靠的飞行控制和优秀的气动设计，保证了飞行的安全。 
在菜鸟网络无人机技术负责人看来，国内首次无人机群组跨海快递飞行成功，是无人机技术的最新应用场景，不仅可以让岛屿居民方便快捷拿到包裹，在运送生鲜产品和医疗用品等高附加值货品方面也大有可为。 
农村淘宝的相关负责人说，跨海运输，彰显跨越时空的电商特征，虽然货品只有小小的几箱百香果，考验的却是村淘点的覆盖和服务能力。百香果来自贫困地区福建长汀县，也能让精准扶贫的理念更实在的落地。 
菜鸟方面表示，作为自动化技术的一种，无人机等多种科技方式和智慧物流平台结合，不仅可以疏通传统物流难以到达的地区，还能为用户带来极致物流体验。“哪怕是生活在天涯海角，都能够享受到智慧物流网络的便捷。” 相关新闻

Videó bemutató a játékról.

Post cost in europe, with bank transfer payment 5€.

és fizetési képességgel licitálj, és csak akkor ha elolvastad a vásárlási feltételeket! 
Kattints a segítség menüpontra! 
Postai utánvételt csak minimum 20 pozitív visszajelzés fölött kérhetsz. 
Kivétel a törzsvásárló! 
Ha szeretnél e-mailben értesülni minden új aukciómról, kattints IDE , vagy az alábbi ikonra!

There is always some shiny new marketing idea, media or strategy being presented as the next big thing. I admit I’m easily distracted by cool, new techno-wizardry or the latest marketing fad and at times am overwhelmed by sheer choice. But experience has taught me there is truly nothing new under the sun. When faced with countless choices of apps, software, tools, fads and experts, there is an easy way to take the mystery out of new marketing ideas and instantly figure out if it’s of any use. I’ll share that in a moment First, a quick story on one of these hot ‘new’ marketing topics illustrates how what’s old is new again. The new guise I’m talking about is “content marketing.” According to Wikipedia, content marketing refers to the “creation and sharing of media and publishing content in order to acquire customers.” To this end the content marketer delivers “consistent, valuable information” to the prospective and current customer through a wide variety of media. 
I’ll wager that you immediately think ‘online’ when you hear ‘content marketing.’ Even Wikipedia magnetic-marketing325.jpgmentions the use of “news, video, white papers, e-books, infographics, case studies, how-to guides, question and answer articles, photos,” and more, most of which are delivered digitally. Yet often in cases like this the only thing that’s new is the media (how it’s delivered.) The underlying concept is, you’ll see, as old as the hills. 
It’s interesting that the evolution of printing technology itself—better and faster ways of putting ink on paper—gave rise to the original content marketing in print. Here are some classic examples. 
Jell-O® began distributing free cookbooks, recipe pamphlets and samples door-to-door in 1904 in an effort to lift sluggish sales. Of course these included dessert recipes that promoted their product. Orator Woodward, the owner, originally purchased the rights to Jell-O® for $450 a few years prior. Frustration with slow sales prompted him to offer the product rights to the plant superintendent for $35 when he decided to try this no-name method of marketing. By 1906 they were doing $1 million annually, or about $25 million in today’s dollars, thanks to content marketing in its printed form. (No, he did not sell the rights!) 
Going further back to 1895, John Deere started its own magazine called The Furrow. It delivered tips to farmers on how to make more money and be more productive. The company celebrated 175 years in 2012 and does about $33 billion annually. It still publishes The Furrow, sending it to a list of 1.5 million readers in 40 countries. 
Another famous example is the Michelin Guide. It was originally a free travel tip guide for automotive travelers which began distribution in 1900. The idea was to boost demand for cars, car travel, and subsequently tires. Then there’s Buyer’s Guide Place started by a photography/electronics store named Magnolia in 1954. Their goal was to teach prospective customers how to buy electronic items wisely. Magnolia later sold out to Best Buy for $87 million. 
That’s the ongoing power of content marketing. Provide something of value to prospective clients on a regular basis. They get to know you, trust you, and understand what you have to offer. If you’re talking to the right prospects, when the time is right, they’ll buy something from you. 
It’s not complicated. It’s definitely not new. It’s simply a marketing strategy that gets a new name every few years. Business author Dan Kennedy called it magnetic marketing…more than 20 years ago. Another name for it is inbound marketing. (That’s hot now too.) The gist is that you are attracting customers to you rather than promoting through advertising and other ‘outbound’ methods. 
Don’t get me wrong. There is no single right or wrong way to promote a business. My point is that if you ignore content marketing, especially in print, you are losing significant business. 
So what’s my secret to taking the mystery out of countless marketing ideas and fads? I picture my ideal customer and my plan to attract, get to know, and do business with them. Then regarding that shiny new marketing object I simply ask, “Will this help me accomplish any of that?” 
When I first started reading about the content marketing sensation, I laughed because I have been doing it for years and getting great results. I didn’t even have to ask my shiny object question. Our primary media for delivering content is the printed newsletter along with an enewsletter. Second to that we use every oth 
It’s proven to work in any business. Just look at our industry examples above. We have tires, food, farm equipment, electronics and printing. It’s not a fad and it can be productive for decades at a time. 
Remember too that your reader will find value in a wide variety of content. Yes, we deliver industry-specific content in order to help our readers. Yet we know that they also value a good laugh, a bit of light distraction and personal development tips as much or more than the industry content itself. 
So be sure to reach out on a regular basis, in as many ways as you can. Content marketing, especially in print, instantly sets you apart from your competitors. Make it a part of your marketing plan for attracting your ideal customer.

posts.text:
关键词： 生活 在家闲着无聊
突然好奇。
照理说，如果很年轻就有了宝宝（我指的是到了已婚年龄 不是那些十几岁就怀孕生娃的）
那以后去开家长会多自信啊 哈哈。
孩子说不定也会很骄傲有漂亮妈妈。
但是会不会因为这个和姐妹们就脱节了啊，
见面聚会也没有共同话题，毕竟已经为人母了……
请美丽的辣妈们都来说说当辣妈这件事给自己 生活 带来的改变或者不便。
